name: vue-basic-autocomplete
description: A Vue.js autocomplete component. Compatible with Vue 2.x.

scripts.build: npm run build:unpkg & npm run build:es & npm run build:umd
scripts.build:umd: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup --config build/rollup.config.js --format umd --file dist/vue-basic-autocomplete.umd.js
scripts.build:es: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup --config build/rollup.config.js --format es --file dist/vue-basic-autocomplete.esm.js
scripts.build:unpkg: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup --config build/rollup.config.js --format iife --file dist/vue-basic-autocomplete.min.js
